title: Lamb's Head Recipe
full_text:
Lamb's Head Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
60 mins
Curing Time
8 hrs
Total
9 hrs 5 mins
Serves
2
to 4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
lamb's head
, tongue removed
Salt
and pepper to taste
Directions
The night before, rub 2 tablespoons of salt over the lamb's head. Pepper to taste.
Preheat the oven to 450°F. Place the head on a roast pan, with both sides of the head showing for even browning. If desired, surround the head with roasting vegetables, such as potatoes.
Roast the head for 45 minutes to 1 hour, until the surface is browned and the cheek meat is tender but still very juicy. Serve immediately.
Lamb
Roasted Lamb
Lamb Mains
